MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA30 postcode area of Largs. It Is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:30pm due to faulty electrical equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:56PM on Wednesday 14 April 2021.
